channel.title: Da Costa G. S. on Giacomo Cordoni
channel.description: Recent content in Da Costa G. S. on Giacomo Cordoni

item.title: Exploring the Galaxy's halo and very metal weak thick disk with SkyMapper and Gaia DR2
item.description: Galactic archeology with the dynamics of Extremely Metal-Poor stras from the SkyMapper survey for Extremely Metal-Poor.

item.title: Gaia and Hubble unveil the kinematics of stellar populations in the Type II globular clusters Omega Centauri and M 22
item.description: Internal dynamics of anomalous/type-II globular clusters combining Gaia astrometric information with HST proper motions

item.title: Multiple populations in globular clusters and their parent galaxies
item.description: By exploiting recent work based on Gaia, half of the known Type II GCs appear clustered in a distinct region of the integral of motions space, thus suggesting a common progenitor galaxy. Except for these Type II GCs, we do not find any significant difference in the MPs between clusters associated with different progenitors.
